title: Strengthening Customer Service Practice Competencies: Mathematics Problem-Based Learning Design Using 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and problem-solving methodologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners will analyze mathematical problems in a 3D virtual environment and derive key variables.
Learners will apply and validate collaboratively developed problem-solving scenarios to 3D models.

Perform mathematical analyses (mean, standard deviation, correlation) on data (e.g., average wait time, customer satisfaction scores) collected from five or more virtual customer service simulations and write a structured five-page report (Introduction–Analysis–Conclusion–Recommendations).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
